sense.def:
Izraz
Miss
uporabljamo pred imenom dekleta ali neporočene ženske.

Kadar človek
misses something
, nečesa ne opazi.

seg.quote: You can't miss it, it's on the first floor.

sense.def:
Kadar človek
misses
, ko poskuša nekaj zadeti, mu tistega ne uspe zadeti.

seg.quote: She had thrown her plate at his head and missed.
He missed the ball at the first swipe.

sense.def:
A miss
je neuspešen poskus, da bi nekaj zadeli.

seg.quote: We had a few near misses in the first raid.

sense.def:
Kadar človek
misses someone
, je žalosten, ker ni več skupaj z nekim človekom. Kadar človek
misses something
, je žalosten, ker nečesa nima več ali ker tistega ne more več doživljati.

seg.quote: The two boys miss their father a great deal.
I knew I should miss living in the Transkei.

sense.def:
Kadar človek
misses a chance or opportunity
, ne izkoristi priložnosti.

seg.quote: It was a good opportunity which it would be a pity to miss.

sense.def:
Kadar človek
misses a bus, plane, or train
, pride prepozno, da bi se lahko odpeljal z določenim avtobusom, letalom ali vlakom.

seg.quote: She was going to miss her plane if her husband didn't hurry.

sense.def:
Kadar človek
misses something
, se nečesa, na primer sestanka, ne udeleži.

seg.quote: I couldn't miss a departmental meeting.
I'd advise you to give it a miss.

sense.def:
Kadar človek
misses out something or someone
, nečesa ali nekoga ne vključi.

seg.quote: You can miss out a surprising number of words and still be understood.

sense.def:
Kadar človek
misses out on something interesting or useful
, se za razliko do drugih nečesa zanimivega ali koristnega ne udeleži ali tistega ne dobi.

seg.quote: I miss out on all these kind of opportunities.
